fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka Holesky fork completed last Wednesday; BP01 launches tomorrow
One hiccup post-fork likely due to operator error/overloaded validator keys

client_updates.highlight: Lighthouse: Higher reorg rate identified; fix in next release
Nethermind bug on testnet; patch available in Discord testnets channel

testing_progress.highlight: Fusaka DevNet 3 recovered from 2-day non-finality test
Bezu 60M gas: 2x performance improvement on arithmetic opcodes
Zantas stateful tests on BloatNet operational; first tests running
BAL DevNet 0: Geth and Reth passing most tests

glamsterdam_eips.highlight: Execution API specs merged; spec work complete for BAL
BAL tests updated; Nethermind nearly ready for Hive

epbs_updates.highlight: ePBS spec ready for DevNet 0; breakout call Friday
Trusted payments decision pending Friday's call

mev_workflow_discussion.highlight: KZG proof removed from blob sidecar endpoint post-Fusaka
Arbitrum switching from get_blob_sidecar to new get_blobs endpoint
Get Payload V2: Lighthouse uses pre-fork; others switch at fork boundary

action_items.action: Update attestant library to support new blob endpoint
Announce blob sidecar API change publicly for community feedback
Push BAL DevNet 0 code to standardized branch 'bal-devnet-0'
Push ePBS DevNet 0 code to branch 'epbs-devnet-0'

decisions.decision: KZG proof field will remain omitted from blob sidecar endpoint for supernodes
Get Payload V2 recommended post-Fusaka to ensure relay compatibility

targets.target: BAL DevNet launch when 3 EL clients ready
ePBS breakout call - Friday this week
